Location: North Delaware (Partially Remote, 1-2 days in office a week)

Salary: $80,000 - 100,000/year

Requirements: .NET, C#, Azure

Based in Delaware, our company is all about compound logistics. We are expanding our software capability and are currently looking to hire on a senior level .NET Developer. We have some of the most talented and driven .NET Developers working for us currently. We are looking for someone with experience in .NET Development, C#, and Azure.

What You Will Be Doing
  • Leading, Designing, and Maintaining business and operational applications
  • Problem solving skills with complex solutions
What You Need for this Position

3+ years of related experience:
  • .NET
  • C#
  • Azure
  • SQL
  • NoSQL
What's In It for You
  • Competitive Salary: $80,000 - $100,000
  • 401k Matching
  • PTO
So, If You Are a .NET Developer With Experience
  • Apply directly to this job opening here!
Or
  • E-mail directly for more information to Ben.Shapiro@Optello.com
Email Your Resume In Word To

Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:

Ben.Shapiro@Optello.com
  • Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : BS11-1645583 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Ben Shapiro - Recruiter - Optello

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

Optello is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer

All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
